HomePage.title: Building Better
HomePage.subtitle: 67 Design & Build supports public and private project owners across Cameroon: studies, design, construction, and 360° maintenance.
HomePage.about_title: Every project is a unique adventure
HomePage.about_content: We guide our clients from the first idea to the final realization, transforming their spaces with creativity, expertise, and precision. Driven by our core values – professionalism, innovation, quality, commitment, and proximity – our team designs tailor-made, elegant, and durable solutions.
HomePage.service_geo_desc: Soil studies and geotechnical analyses to ensure foundation stability and safety.
HomePage.service_cal_desc: Our team carries out comprehensive structural studies to guarantee stability, durability, and efficiency, regardless of project size.
HomePage.service_cost_desc: Each quotation is based on rigorous analysis and a complete understanding of the project, offering a clear and controlled view of costs.
HomePage.service_work_desc: Each stage is carried out with precision to ensure durable, safe, and standards-compliant structures.
HomePage.expertise_desc: Through an approach combining design and construction, we create elegant, functional, and sustainable spaces fully adapted to our clients’ needs.
HomePage.area_services_desc: Shops and retail stores, Shopping centers, Restaurants, cafés and bars, Hotels and hospitality venues, Spas and beauty salons, Leisure and entertainment areas
HomePage.area_pro_desc: Offices and headquarters, Business centers and coworking spaces, Public institutions and administrations, Schools, universities and training centers
HomePage.area_res_desc: Private villas and residences, Residential buildings and apartments, Warehouses and industrial buildings, Garages and storage areas
HomePage.project_saga_desc: Complete interior and exterior renovation, modernized design with an African spirit.
HomePage.project_carino_desc: 10-story mixed-use building (ice cream shop, spa, gym, offices, apartments).
HomePage.cta_desc: Our integrated approach combines aesthetics, functionality, and sustainability to create spaces that reflect your identity and fulfill your aspirations.
